subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals agreed to a four-year, $32 million contract with the left-hander Jason Vargas, trying to fill the void in their rotation created by Ervin Santana’s free agency.
snippet: The Kansas City Royals agreed to a four-year, $32 million contract with the left-hander Jason Vargas, trying to fill the void in their rotation created by Ervin Santana’s free agency.
